headline: 2022 March Hackness: The Return of the Phishing Bracket - What 56 Million Emails Reveal about the Most Impersonated Brands
keywords: Email Security, Cloudflare Area 1, Phishing, Spoofing
description: Learn who made the list of the top brands that attackers use in phishing lures. This bracket is based on an analysis of more than 56 million phishing emails blocked by Area 1â€™s solution in the preceding 12 months since Feb 2022.
